gen:link.msg:message: `BorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutions` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_BorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_BorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsBreakdownHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBorrowingsFromGovernmentsCreditInstitutionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
